event.description: Joshua Hoshiko appointed Minister of Communications
Cassie DeBurke begins work on HPG theory
First HPG message transmitted
Jerome Blake born on Terra
Jerome Blake graduates from University of Lambrecht
Richard Cameron becomes First Lord of the Star League
18 Periphery worlds secede from the Star League
Stefan Amaris kills all known Camerons, seizes 95 Terran Hegemony worlds, and gains control of 70% of Terran Hegemony HPGs
SLDF begins march to Terra
Jerome Blake returns to Terra
Jerome Blake appointed Minister of Communications
Lords of the High Council adjourn for the last time
Each Lord of the High Council individually gives Jerome Blake responsibility for the reconstruction of Terra
Court of the Star League sealed
80% of SLDF undertakes Operation Exodus, the remainder pledging assistance to the reconstruction effort. First Circuit reestablished
Conrad Toyama appointed Chief Administrator of Dieron HPG, ComStar Letter of Credit instituted
First Succession War begins when Minoru Kurita declares himself First Lord of the Star League. Department of Communications changes name to ComStar, Operation Silver Shield approved and begun
Neutrality of ComStar outlined by Communications Protocol of 2787
Operation Silver Shield amended to include conquest of Terra only. All HPGs shut down, military portion of Operation Silver Shield begins, ComStar takes Terra
Mercenary Review Board formed
ComStar Archives Branch created
Minoru Kurita assassinated, Kentares IV massacre
ComStar becomes profitable
ROM formed
Jerome Blake dies, Conrad Toyama named Prime Administrator of ComStar, ROM purge initiated, ComStar Order formed
Conrad Toyama visits House leaders and raises HPG rates
First Succession War ends, Jeannette Marik joins ComStar and begins leaking information to House Marik
House Steiner taxes ComStar and suffers Interdiction, ComStar logo created
Taxes and Interdiction lifted, Conrad Toyama begins recruitment trip in the Periphery
Minnesota Tribe attacks Svelvik and Trondheim
ComStar News Bureau formed
Second Succession War begins

Charles Marik orders Oriente HPG station destroyed, killing Jeannette Marik, Free Worlds League suffers Interdiction, ComStar War begins, Conrad Toyama dies and is named a saint, Raymond Karpov named Primus
Marik Interdiction lifted, ComStar War ends, Organizational Edict 3056 expands ROM, Michelle Dupreas resigns and is assassinated, Janice Laidlaw appointed head of ROM, Operation Holy Shroud begins
Operation Holy Shroud ends
Doctrinal Edict of 2861 formalizes process of naming Primus
Second Succession War ends
Third Succession War begins
Raymond Karpov steps down, Andrea Marteen named Primus
ROM stages "Black December" incident
Raymond Karpov dies
HPG transmisson rates raised

Andrea Marteen dies, Dwight Kurstin named Primus, First Circuit revolts and leaves Terra, "Witch-Hunt" transmission sent, Terra suffers Interdiction, Court of the Star League unsealed, Operation Winged Crusader begins
Dwight Kurstin assassinated, Gregori Hartford named Primus, ComStar Civil War covered up by ROM, Court of the Star League resealed
Gregori Hartford dies, Kari Marshall named Primus
Kari Marshall tours Periphery, Periphery communications link begun
Kari Marshall dies, Hollings York named Primus, Necess Kurita joins ComStar and is kidnapped by Hugai Kurita, ComStar hires mercenaries and threatens the Draconis Combine, Necess Kurita released
ComStar Guards and Militia formed
Hollings York proposes abolishment of ROM and is assassinated, Adrienne Sims named Primus, Hollings York named a saint
Adrienne Sims begins having nightmares about an invasion from beyond the Periphery, Explorer Corps formed
First Explorer Corps ships enter the Periphery
Adrienne Sims dies, Yin Takami named Primus, the Tripitz Affair takes place, Operation Holy Shroud II begins
First Circuit reorganized to include Tharkad, Atreus, Sian and New Avalon
Yin Takami dies, Allen Rusenstein named Primus
ComStar begins extensive recruitment in the Periphery
ComStar begins supplying bandit kings
The Jolly Roger Affair
Wolf's Dragoons appear in the Federated Suns
Thomas Marik joins ComStar, Allen Rusenstein resigns, Julian Tiepolo named Primus
Wolf's Dragoons disappear and reappear refitted
Marik Civil War instigated
Anton Marik declares himself Captain-General, Marik Civil War begins
Anton Marik breaks Wolf's Dragoons contract and kills Joshua Wolf, Wolf's Dragoons attack New Delos and kill Anton Marik, Precentor ROM Vesar Kristofur excommunicated, NAIS created
Wolf's Dragoons disappear and once again reappear refitted
Katrina Steiner sends Peace Proposal to all Houses
Federated-Commonwealth Alliance Document signed, Concord of Kapteyn signed
Third Succession War ends
Gray Death Legion discovers Helm Library Core, Wolf's Dragoons take An Ting HPG, Hanse Davion and Melissa Steiner marry, Fourth Succession War begins

House Davion framed for destruction of Sarna HPG and suffers Interdiction, ComStar covertly attacks NAIS, Julian Tiepolo dies, Myndo Waterly named Primus, ComStar 'Mechs stationed at House Davion HPGs, Interdiction lifted
Fourth Succession War ends, Operation Rosebud initiated
House Kurita recognizes the Free Rasalhague Republic, Operation Rosebud ends, Anastasius Focht joins ComStar, Operation Flush begins
Readjustment Act of 3035 passed
ComStar 'Mechs stationed at House Liao HPGs
War of 3039 takes place
ComStar 'Mechs stationed at House Steiner HPGs
Operation Flush ends
Explorer Corps vessel Outbound Light encounters Clan forces
Operation Revival takes place, contact established with the Clans
Anastasius Focht appointed ambassador to the Clans, Clans invade Inner Sphere, Leo Showers killed

Ulric Kerensky voted IlKhan, invasion resumes, Battle of Tukayyid fought, Operation Scorpion takes place, Myndo Waterly assassinated, Sharilar Mori named Primus of ComStar, Demona Aziz rebels and forms the Word of Blake. New service contracts signed with each House but Marik, Thomas Marik named Primus-in-Exile of Word of Blake, Word of Blake signs contract with House Marik
Terran Peace Summit takes place, ComStar begins announcing troop movements, Mercenary Review and Bonding Commission replaces Mercenary Review Board, University of Blake begins construction
ComStar opens vaults of history to public access
The Word of Blake takes Terra, Sun-Tzu Liao kills Demona Aziz, Cameron St. Jamais named head of Toyama Sect
